game.name: Train Simulator: Norfolk Southern SD40-2 High Nose Loco Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The SD40-2 High Nose is a classic US diesel locomotive for Train Simulator 2012, and a great add-on for fans of the Norfolk Southern Railroad.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The SD40-2 High Nose is a classic US diesel locomotive for Train Simulator 2012, and a great add-on for fans of the Norfolk Southern Railroad.
